response.overview: Kidz 'n Power is the first comprehensive video series created to help responsible parents protect their children with the knowledge on how to resist child abduction and victimization.  It consists of three sections that show and tell with a remarkable of expert interviews, role–playing scenarios, and demonstrations featuring kids, adults and real–life settings that viewers will easily relate to.  In an era when parents can't keep their children in their sights 100% of the time, the safety education offered in Kidz 'n Power  helps ensure children stay out of harms way and gives them the techniques and confidence to escape a potentially dangerous situation.  It is truly a one–stop, user friendly resource for today's active, time–crunched family, which focuses on empowerment and communication, not fear.
response.title: Kidz 'n Power Abduction Prevention Pack
